śatam śatam ratha agryāṇām gaja aśva aśvatarasya ca
dāśī nicaya niṣkānām dīyatām yadi śakyate

original: ityukte tena taṃ vipraṃ sasmitaḥ pratyabhāṣata /
analyzed: iti ukte tena tam vipram sa smitaḥ pratyabhāṣata
anāthapiṇḍada gṛhe dāsye śulkam tad alpakam
brāhmaṇena akhile tasmin kanyā śulke pratiśrute
tam ādarāt gṛhapatiḥ bhojanāya nyamantrayat
sa bhuktvā vividham tatra bhakṣya bhojyam a yantritaḥ
rātrau visūcikā ākrāntaḥ cukrośa vipula vyathaḥ
ye nnam aśnanti laulyena niśi nidrā sukha apaham

original: janmakarma kathaṃ kuryuḥ paralokasukhāya te // KAvk_21.15 //
analyzed: janma karma katham kuryuḥ para loka sukhāya te
tatyāja aśuci bhītyā tam gṛhāt parijanaḥ bahis

original: āspadaṃ nairapekṣyasya jātyā dāsajanaḥ śaṭhaḥ // KAvk_21.16 //
analyzed: āspadam nairapekṣyasya jātyā dāsa janaḥ śaṭhaḥ
śubhena karmaṇā tasya saṃprāptaḥ tena vartmanā
sa maudgalyāyanaḥ śāriputraḥ kāruṇya peśalaḥ

original: taṃ vaṃśasya dalāgreṇa nirlikhyāpi tathā mṛdā /
analyzed: tam vaṃśasya dala agreṇa nirlikhya api tathā mṛdā

original: prakṣālya dharmamādiśya tau tasya yayatuḥ śanaiḥ // KAvk_21.18 //
analyzed: prakṣālya dharmam ādiśya tau tasya yayatuḥ śanais
saḥ pi cittam tayoḥ agre prasādya tyakta vigrahaḥ
caturmahārājikeṣu deveṣu samājāyata
tatra viśravaṇa ādeśāt martya loke niketane
sa cakre śibira dvāre pūjā adhiṣṭhāna saṃnidhim
yathā uditam
anāthapiṇḍadaḥ śulkam ādāya svayam āyayau
sa saṃbandhi gṛham prāpya dadarśa āścarya kāriṇīm
śikhara ākāra rāja arha bhakṣya saṃbhāra saṃpadam
sa vismayāt gṛhapatim papraccha svaccha mānasaḥ
kaḥ yam api rājā nimantritaḥ

original: sa taṃ babhāṣe bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃghaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: sa tam babhāṣe bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃgha parigrahaḥ

original: mayā nimantritaḥ saṃghe so 'yam mama mahotsavaḥ // KAvk_21.24 //
analyzed: mayā nimantritaḥ saṃghe saḥ yam mama mahā utsavaḥ
iti buddha abhidhānena jāta romāzncakaṇṭakaḥ
indu syandiḥ iva alkinnaḥ sahasā eva babhūva saḥ
avidita parama arthe kasyacid nāma mātre
sphurati sahaja bhāvaḥ kaḥ pi janma anubandhaḥ
abhinava ghana nāde vyakta harṣa abhilāṣaḥ
spṛśati lalita nṛtya udvṛtta vṛttim mayūraḥ
saḥ vadat vadana ambhoja saṃjāta abhinava dyutiḥ

original: ka eṣa bhagavān buddhaḥ kaśca saṃgho 'bhidhīyate // KAvk_21.27 //
analyzed: kaḥ eṣa bhagavān buddhaḥ kaḥ ca saṃghaḥ abhidhīyate
iti pṛṣṭaḥ gṛhapatiḥ tena provāca sa smitaḥ

original: aho bata na jānīṣe śāstāraṃ bhuvanatraye // KAvk_21.28 //
analyzed: aho bata na jānīṣe śāstāram bhuvanatraye

original: jina yastaṃ na jānāti sa loke vañcitaḥ param // KAvk_21.29 //
analyzed: jina yaḥ tam na jānāti sa loke vañcitaḥ param
kim tena moha līnena viphalīkṛta janmanā
ajñāna taraṇa upāyam vayaḥ yena vyayīkṛtam
gotamaḥ bhagavān buddhaḥ śākya rājakuladbhivaḥ
saṃbudhya anuttaram samyaksaṃbodhim anagārikaḥ
paścāt pravrajitānām ca tasya eva anugrahāt param

original: bhikṣūṇāṃ gatarāgāṇām samūhaḥ saṃgha ucyate // KAvk_21.32 //
analyzed: bhikṣūṇām gata rāgāṇām samūhaḥ saṃghaḥ ucyate
saḥ eṣa buddha pramukhaḥ saṃghaḥ sva kuśala eṣiṇāḥ

original: mayā puṇyapaṇaṃ prāpyaṃ praṇayena nimantritaḥ // KAvk_21.33 //
analyzed: mayā puṇya paṇam prāpyam praṇayena nimantritaḥ
iti tat vacanam śrutvā tat smṛtvā anāthapiṇḍadaḥ
buddha ālambana bhāvena niśi nidrām samāyayau

original: prabhātamiti sa jñātvā puradvāreṇa niryayau // KAvk_21.35 //
analyzed: prabhātam iti sa jñātvā pura dvāreṇa niryayau
śibikā dvāram āsādya saṃprāptaḥ iva devatām
madhuskandhena nirdiṣṭam śreyaḥ panthānam āptavān

original: bhagavāṃstaṃ tataḥ prāpya sa tṛṣṇārta ivāmṛtam /
analyzed: bhagavān tam tatas prāpya sa tṛṣṇā ārtaḥ iva amṛtam
babhūva anupama āsvādam pramoda āmoda nirvṛtaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā sa ādaram dūrāt chāyā tarum iva adhvagaḥ
avāpa gata saṃtāpaḥ śrāntim viśrānti śītalām
tasya tad darśanā iva vimala abhigataḥ manaḥ
śarad samāgamena iva ghana dhvānta ujjhitam nabhaḥ
sa kaḥ pi puṇya śīlānām anubhāvaḥ prasādinām
bhavanti yad prasādena nirvighnāḥ citta vṛttayaḥ
saḥ cintayat aho moha vihīnasya hi me tathā
anuccheda vikāraḥ yam jātaḥ praśama saṃpadaḥ

original: vañcito 'smi na yatpūrvaṃ dṛṣto 'yaṃ bhagavān mayā /
analyzed: vañcitaḥ smi na yat pūrvam dṛṣtaḥ yam bhagavān mayā
na adhanyānām iyam yāti mūrtiḥ locana gocaram

original: amṛtamadhirodārā dṛṣṭirdyutiḥ śaśipeśalā taruṇakaruṇāyattā vṛttiḥ prasādamayī matiḥ /
analyzed: amṛta madhirā udārā dṛṣṭiḥ dyutiḥ śaśi peśalā taruṇa karuṇā āyattā vṛttiḥ prasāda mayī matiḥ

original: ayamatiśayaṃ pratyāsannaḥ karoti virāgatāṃ vigatarajasāṃ niḥsaṃsāraḥ priyo 'pi parigrahaḥ // KAvk_21.43 //
analyzed: ayam atiśayam pratyāsannaḥ karoti virāga tām vigata rajasām niḥsaṃsāraḥ parigrahaḥ
iti citta prasādena cintayan upasṛtya saḥ
vidadhe tasya sa ānandaḥ pāda padma abhivandanam
bhagavān api tad prāpti prasāda ānanda lakṣaṇam
uvāha vadana chāyam pūrṇa kāruṇya pūritam
dṛṣṭim āśvāsa jananīm kāmaṃkām api tasya saḥ
visasarja ujjvalām janma rajaḥ śuddhyai sudhā nadīm
atha asya bhagavān bhradrām vidadhe dharma deśanām
caturṇām ārya satyānām pratibhāva vidhāyinīm
sa śāsanāt hi saṃvyasta samasta kleśa saṃtatiḥ
nijam janma nivedya asmai praṇataḥ tam abhāṣataḥ
atikrāntaḥ smi bhagavan bhavantam śaraṇam gataḥ

original: vipannavāsanābhyāsaḥ saṃsāre na rame param // KAvk_21.49 //
analyzed: vipanna vāsanā abhyāsaḥ saṃsāre na rame param
karoti akuśalam dūre śubham āśu prayacchati
sūcayati ucita ācāram mahatam avalokanam
sukha arham tvad vihārāya vihāram parama ādarāt
ratna sāra pura udāram sva puram kārayāmi aham
karotu tatra bhagavān satatam sthiti anugraham
dhanaiḥ āsevitaḥ smābhiḥ saparyā paricaryayā
iti arthanām tathā iti asya bhagavān pratyapadyata
praṇayu prārthanā bhaṅga pragalbhāḥ na hi sādhavaḥ
bhagavantam athā āmantrya śrāvastīm sa purīm yayau
tad ādiṣṭena sahitaḥ śāriputreṇa bhikṣuṇā
tatra jeta kumāreṇa bhūyasā
dattam kāñcanam ādāya vihāram tam asūtrayat
bhakti utsāhāt atha ārambha kṛta sāhāyyakaḥ suraiḥ
vihāram tridiva ākāram cakāra anāthapiṇḍadaḥ
tatra jeta kumāraḥ pi bhaktyā bhagavataḥ param
yaśaḥ puṇya pratiṣṭhāyai vidadhe dvāra koṣṭhakam
atha a tīrthyāḥ tam ālokya vihāra ārambham adbhutam
sa apavāda vivādena cakruḥ dveṣa ākulāḥ kalim
raktākṣa pramukhaḥ teṣām mātsaryāt kṣudra praṇḍitaḥ

original: sapakṣa iva kṛṣṇāhiścakitaḥ purataḥ sadā // KAvk_21.59 //
analyzed: sa pakṣaḥ iva kṛṣṇa ahiḥ cakitaḥ puratas sadā
ruddhe vihāra saṃbhāre tena vāda jaya avadhi
anāthapiṇḍada girā śāriputraḥ samāyayau
raktākṣaḥ tha tam āhūya prabhāva utkarṣa darśane
indrajāla bala utphullam sahakāram adarśayat
śāriputra prabhāva utthaiḥ vipulaiḥ tad mukha anilaiḥ

original: unmūlitaḥ śakalatāṃ tīrthyotsāha ivāpa saḥ // KAvk_21.62 //
analyzed: unmūlitaḥ śakala tām tīrthya utsāhaḥ iva āpa saḥ
rakta akṣa vihitām phulla kamalām padminīm tatas
paṅka śeṣām dvipaḥ cakre śāriputra vinirmitaḥ
ratkākṣa vakṣaḥ nikṣiptaḥ sapta śīrṣa mahā uragaḥ

preritaḥ mantravirtyeṇa raktākṣam hantum udyayau

original: śaraṇaṃ pādapatitaḥ śāriputraṃ jagāma saḥ // KAvk_21.66 //

rakta akṣaḥ tena bhaṅgena śaraṇyam śaraṇam gataḥ
pravrajyāyām vīta rāgaḥ śuddhām
tīrthyāḥ tu anye paridveṣa krodha pāramitā aṃśavaḥ
tatra karmakara vyājāt tasthuḥ bhikṣa vadha udyatāḥ
te tha dharma druhaḥ kāle śāriputreṇa lakṣitāḥ
tad dṛṣṭipāta mātreṇa babhūvuḥ maitra mānasāḥ

original: āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca vicārya saḥ /
analyzed: āśaya anuśayam dhātum prakṛtim ca vicārya saḥ
dharma deśanayā teṣām dideśa anuttarām daśām
atha tasya vihārasya nirvighna ārambha karmaṇi
anāthapiṇḍadam prāha śāriputraḥ smita ānanaḥ
vihāra sūtra pātasya tulyaḥ eva kṣaṇe mahān
haumaḥ vihāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ tuṣite deva sadmani
etat ākarṇya saṃjāta prasāda dviguṇa antaraḥ
hema ratna vara āgāram vihāram samakārayat
vibhavaiḥ atha rāja arhaiḥ pathi tena upakalpitaiḥ
vijñaptiḥ tridivaiḥ sārdham āyayau bhagavān jinah
tad āgamana harṣeṇa prasanne bhavana traye
anāthapiṇḍadaḥ tasmai vāri dhārām apātayat

original: tasmin yadā na pradeśe vāridhārā papāta sā /
analyzed: tasmin yadā na pradeśe vāri dhārā papāta sā

original: tadā bhagavato vākyāt tvaritaṃ patitānyataḥ // KAvk_21.76 //

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kautukāt pṛṣṭo bhikṣubhirbhagavān punaḥ /

uvāca śrūyatām etat vāri stambhasya kāraṇam
anena pūrva buddhebhyaḥ asmin eva idam āspadam

anena eva purā samyaksaṃbuddhāya vipaśyine
ayam eva varārāma pradeśaḥ pratipāditaḥ
buddhāya śikhine prādāt puṣya janmani ayam punar

original: tato dadau viśvabhuve jināya raghijanmani // KAvk_21.80 //
analyzed: tatas dadau viśvabhuve jināya raghi janmani
bhavadatta abhidhaḥ bhūtvā kakucchandāya dattavān
dadau kanaka ākhyāya tāyine
kāśyapāya punar ca ayam prādāt āṣāḍhajanmaniḥ
anena eva adhunā mahyam deśaḥ yam pratipāditaḥ
kālena sudhana ākhyaḥ yam maitreyāya pradāsyati
sattvavān kṣānti śīla tvāt nidhānāni eṣa paśyati
punar ca ayam gṝhapatiḥ bhūtvā hemaprada abhidhaḥ
cakre pratyekabuddhasya saṃskāram parinirvṛtau
ratna kumbhe tad asthīni dhṛtvā tad praṇidhānataḥ
adhunā ratna kośa arhaḥ saṃjātaḥ yam suvarṇa bhās
śrutvā iti śāstuḥ vacana abhidhānam te bhikṣavaḥ sāram iva amṛtasya

original: iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ jetavanapratigrahāvadānaṃ nāma ekaviṃśaṃ pallavaḥ //
analyzed: iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyām jetavanapratigrahāvadānam nāma ekaviṃśam pallavaḥ

original: śrīmān purā śākyapure narendraḥ śuddhodanaḥ śuddhisudhānidhānam /

original: babhurvimānaiḥ kakubhāṃ mukhāni bhaktyeva śāsturvihitastavāni // KAvk_22.14 //

analyzed: nāradena prabhām dṛṣṭvā kiṣkindhā adri sthitaḥ muniḥ
kasmāt arka śata ālokaḥ iva ālokaḥ pradṛśyate
tamaḥ daridrām yena iti girayaḥ sa guhā gṛhāḥ
vismayāt iti tena uktaḥ saḥ vadat divya locanaḥ
jātaḥ puṇya prabhāsaḥ yam bodhisattvasya janmani
acireṇa eva tam vatsa drakṣāvaḥ kuśala āptaye
iti uktvā muniḥ ānandāt viśrānti sukhitaḥ bhavat
putra janmani sarva artha siddhim śuddhodanaḥ param
dṛṣṭvā sarvārthasiddhaḥ yam iti nāma asya nirmame
śākyavardhana nāmā abhūt yakṣaḥ śākyapura āśrayaḥ
yad praṇāmeṇa śākyānām śiśavaḥ nirupadravāḥ
tad sthityā preṣitaḥ pitrā praṇāmāya sa guhyakaḥ
tam bodhisattvam ālokya nipapāta asya pādayoḥ
atha utsaṅge samādāya hṛṣṭaḥ tam pṛthivīpatiḥ
lakṣaṇāni nimitta jñaiḥ tasya dehe vyalokayat
lakṣaṇa jñāḥ tatas sarve nṛpam ūcuḥ sa vismayāḥ
deva divya kumāraḥ yam lakṣaṇaiḥ upalakṣyate
jāyate lakṣaṇaiḥ etaiḥ viśva viśrānta śāsanaḥ
śakra adhipaḥ cakravartī bhagavān sa tathāgataḥ
dīrgha aṅguli dalau cakra lāñchanau su pratiṣṭhitau
aruṇau caraṇau asya kāntau kamala komalau
rājahaṃsaḥ iva prāṃśuḥ sa jāla aṅguli pallavaḥ
eṣa jānu yugaḥ śrīmān ā jānu bhuja bhūṣitaḥ
sa kośabasti guhyaḥ ca nyagrodha parimaṇḍalaḥ
dakṣiṇa āvarta roma aṅkaḥ pariṇāha sama unnatiḥ
rajaḥ mala lava āspṛṣṭa sta jāmbūnada dyutiḥ
siṃha pūrva ardha kāyaḥ ca bṛhat spaṣṭa aṅga vigrahaḥ
catvāriṃśat samā prota śukla dantaḥ su nāsikaḥ
dīrgha pratanu jihvaḥ ca megha dundubhi niśvanaḥ
sita ūrṇā aṅkaḥ bhruvoḥ bhāgaḥ svastika uraḥsthala ujjvalaḥ
lekhā śṛṅga abja hastaḥ yam chatra ākāra śirāḥ śiśuḥ
rājan ayam te tanayaḥ cakravartī bhaviṣyati
samyaksaṃbodhi saṃbuddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ vā bhaviṣyati

original: ityuktvā teṣu jāteṣu lebhe harṣaṃ mahīpatiḥ /

original: devātideva ityasya nāma cakre mahīpatiḥ // KAvk_24.39 //

nāradena atha sahitaḥ tattva darśī tapaḥ vanāt
tam samabhyāyayau draṣṭum ādarāt asitaḥ muniḥ
sa bodhisattvam bāla arkam iva kalpa prakāśanam
dṛṣṭvā vikāsi vakrkra śrīḥ lebhe kamala tulya tām
saḥ brāvīt vihita ātithyam nṛpatim praṇatam muniḥ
rājan guṇa gaṇena iva spṛhaṇīyaḥ si sūnunā
etāni lakṣaṇāni asya mokṣa lakṣmī samāgamam
vadanti cakravarti śrīḥ phalam nā eṣām vinaśvaram
asya bodhi prabhāveṇa saṃbuddhasi mukha ambujam
dhanya padma ākarasya iva netra pātram kariṣyati

dhanyāḥ vāc amṛtaiḥ asya bhaviṣyanti upajīvinaḥ
puṇya bhāji jagati asmin ekaḥ evā asmi vañcitaḥ
etat saṃdarśanam yasya pūrṇa kālasya durlabham
iti uktvā nṛpam āmantrya gatvā vyomnā tapovanam
su prasannam manaḥ kṛtvā dehatyāgam acintayat
sa paryanta upadeśāya nāradena abhicoditaḥ
tam uvāca amṛtam vatsam kumāraḥ kathayiṣyati
adhigamya amṛtam tasmāt nṛpa sūnoḥ anāmayam

original: cyutaṃ cakarṣaṃ dvidataṃ nandaḥ sapta padāni tam /

original: avāpa viśrutāṃ loke śuddhaśīla ivonnatim // KAvk_24.56 //

original: putraste cakravartī vā munirvā saptame 'hani // KAvk_24.64 //

a śikṣita vikāreṇa cetasā sa vyacintayat

original: aho batāntarāyaṃ me māraḥ kartuṃ samudyataḥ /
analyzed: aho bata antarāyam me māraḥ kartum samudyataḥ

original: māra māra virāmaste daurjanyasya na jāyate /

original: ekena hiṃsāyajñena prāpteyaṃ kamratā tvayā // KAvk_25.49 //

iti nirbhatsitaḥ tena citta stenaḥ śarīriṇām

original: sāmarṣaḥ prayayau māraḥ samārambhād hatodyamaḥ // KAvk_25.51 //
analyzed: sa amarṣaḥ prayayau māraḥ samārambhāt hata udyamaḥ
atha adṛśyanta lalitāḥ lālityā añcita locanāḥ
bhramat bhṛṅga raṅgiṇyaḥ kāntāḥ cūta latāḥ iva
cāru tad carita atṛptāḥ tisraḥ tāḥ kāma kanyakāḥ
sa rāgam pāda nalinī nyāsaiḥ cakruḥ tapaḥ vanam
vilocanena hariṇī kariṇī gati vibhramaiḥ
tatra tābhiḥ mukha ambhojaiḥ nalinī malinīkṛtā
yauvana ābharaṇaiḥ aṅgauḥ anurāga a vilepanaiḥ
lāvaṇya vasanaiḥ tāsām kāmaḥ bhūt api acetasām
vajrāsana samādhāna dhyāna niścala locanam

original: parityajyaiva sahasā salajjā bhejire jarām // KAvk_25.57 //
analyzed: parityajya eva sahasā sa lajjāḥ bhejire jarām
pratīpa gamanāt tāsām atha bhagna manorathaḥ

sarva praharaṇaiḥ vyāptam nānā prāṇi mukhaiḥ bhayaiḥ
ṣaṭtriṃśat koṭī vipulam balam tasya samudyayau

māraḥ sphāra vikāreṇa bodhisattvam samādravat

smaraḥ u pi naṣṭa saṃkalpaḥ samādheḥ śrotra kaṇṭakam

original: taṃ tāramukharaṃ vṛkṣaṃ māraṃ ca sabalāyudham /

cakravāṭe samutkṣipya cikṣipuḥ vyomadevatāḥ

sarva vid sarva gaḥ bhavat
sa tatra anuttara jñāna samyaksaṃbodhim āpitaḥ
dadarśa sarva bhutāṇi gatim karma ūrmi nirmitām
atha śākyapure māraḥ pravādam asṛjat divaḥ

original: nipapāta tamākarṇya vajrāhata iva kṣitau // KAvk_25.68 //

tasmin mahā utsava ānande bodhisattva vadhūḥ sutam

original: jananyā saśilaḥ śuddhyai nikṣipto 'mbhasi pupluve // KAvk_25.73 //

original: aho tava mayā jñātā pūrvameṣā sukhasthitiḥ /

yayā sura asura aiśvarya sukham duḥkhagaṇāyate

klāntaḥ śānti āśritim upagataḥ candana chāyayā iva

asmin avasare puṇya paripākeṇa tat vanam
vaṇijau pṛthu sārthena prāptau trapusa bhallikau

original: puṇyāṅkurārhasya phalaṃ viśālapalārhametat prathamaṃ hi puṣpam // KAvk_43.1 //

niḥśeṣa kośa dānena na nāma anuśayaḥ astu me

original: rājñṃ dṛkpātapātreṇa prāpyante yadi na śriyaḥ /
analyzed: rājñam dṛkpāta pātreṇa prāpyante yadi na śriyaḥ
tad anartham gata arthinyā kaḥ thaḥ pārthiva sevayā
iti uktaḥ kṣitipālena kumāraḥ kalita añjaliḥ
tam abhāṣata bhūpāla dātum arhati kaḥ paraḥ
an arthitena ratnāni vibudhebhyaḥ prayacchatā

original: tadunnidraṃ samudrasya mudritaṃ bhavatā yaśaḥ // KAvk_48.46 //
analyzed: tat unnidram samudrasya mudritam bhavatā yaśaḥ
mahatā api prayatnena pūryate na mahā āśayaḥ
alpakānām tat airśvaryam dāridyam tat mahīyasām
kim tu tvad bhuja guptānām dharma mārgeṇa jīvatām

original: janānāṃ nāsti dāridyaṃ draviṇaṃ yena mṛgyate // KAvk_48.48 //
analyzed: janānām na asti dāridyam draviṇam yena mṛgyate

original: dhanārthino na tu vayaṃ na ca sevādhikāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: dhana arthinaḥ na tu vayam na ca sevā adhikāriṇaḥ

original: dhanaṃ dhanaṃ dhanadhiyāṃ māna eva manasvinām // KAvk_48.49 //
analyzed: dhanam dhanam dhana dhiyām mānaḥ eva manasvinām

original: mīladguṇena parameśvarasevanena nurmūlatām sumanasāṃ sahasā gatānām /
analyzed: mīlat guṇena parameśvara sevanena nuḥ mūla tām sumanasām sahasā gatānām

original: dainyātpunaḥ kṛpaṇapaṇyapathe cyutānāṃ na sparśamātramapi sādhujanaḥ karoti // KAvk_48.50 //
analyzed: dainyāt punar kṛpaṇa paṇya pathe cyutānām na sparśa mātram api sādhu janaḥ karoti
arthi tvāt maraṇam varam tanubhṛtām dainya avasanna ātmanām
arthī sarva jana avamāna vasatiḥ satkāra yogyaḥ śavaḥ
kumbhaḥ tāvat adhas prayāti guṇavān kūpa avatāre param
yāvat moha tamaḥ praveśa vivaśaḥ prāptaḥ ṛthi tā lambate
sāmānyāḥ dhana saṃpadaḥ kraya kṛṣi prāpyā sadā dhīmatām
saṃtoṣaḥ yadi nā asti tat kim aparā bhūmiḥ nidhāna āvṛtā
santi eva atiśaya prasāda niratāḥ tāḥ hema ratna kriyāḥ

original: kasyeṣṭaḥ priyasaṃgamāya vapuṣāṃ sevāmayo vikrayaḥ // KAvk_48.52 //
analyzed: kasya iṣṭaḥ priya saṃgamāya vapuṣām sevā mayaḥ vikrayaḥ
iti apāra dhiyaḥ tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mahīpatiḥ
gṝhyatām aparam kiṃcid iti abhāṣata sa ādaraḥ
aucitya catur ālāpaḥ karkaśaḥ nṛpām priyaḥ
kṛpaṇaḥ cāṭu kāraḥ pi karṇa śūlāya kevalaḥ
aurdārya parituṣṭena sa rājñā abhyarthitaḥ param

original: tamūce yadu tuṣṭo 'si sutā mahyaṃ pradīyatām // KAvk_48.55 //
analyzed: tam ūce yadu tuṣṭaḥ si sutā mahyam pradīyatām
iti ukte tena nṛpatiḥ saṃdeha āndolita āśayaḥ
prātar vaktāham iti uktvā kṣaṇam kṣmā talam aikṣata
sa kumāram visṛjya atha pradhāna amātyam abravīt
prasāda rabhasena eva kṛtam vāc cāpalam mayā
cakravarti kula utpannā kanyā puṇya paṇa ucitā
katham sāmānya paurāya guṇa mātreṇa dīyate
dadāmi iti pratiśrutya paścāt anuśaya ākulaḥ
katham sa rādhanaḥ bhūtvā bhaviṣyāmi arthi niṣphalaḥ

original: kathaṃ prāptasya tasyāhaṃ prātardraṣṭ mukhaṃ puraḥ /
analyzed: katham prāptasya tasya aham prātar draṣṭ mukham puras

original: priyo 'pyapriyatāṃ yātaḥ sa me durlabhayecchayā // KAvk_48.60 //
analyzed: priyaḥ api apriya tām yātaḥ sa me durlabhayā icchayā
nūnam prakṛtyā eva śarīriṇām

original: vakti yāvanna dehīti tāvadgavati vallabhah // KAvk_48.61 //
analyzed: vakti yāvat na dehi iti tāvat gavati
iti bhūmipateḥ śrutvāḥ vacaḥ dolā avalambinaḥ
tam uvāca mahā amātyaḥ saṃcintya avasara ucitam
an ālocita paryantāḥ pratyagra sarasa ādarāḥ
svabhāva rabhasāḥ eva bhavanti prabhu buddhayaḥ
aśakya arthanayā tena lubdhena iva guṇa udayaḥ
rāja sevā pravṛttena hema hastī vināśitaḥ
vācyaḥ u sau bhavatā svairam kanyā arthī punar āgataḥ

original: hemahastinamāruhya prāptaḥ prāpsyasi me sutām // KAvk_48.65 //
analyzed: hema hastinam āruhya prāptaḥ prāpsyasi me sutām
tena utkṛttaḥ sva hastena kutas tasya sa kuñjaraḥ

original: na cāsau tadvirahitaḥ punarāyāti lajjayā // KAvk_48.66 //
analyzed: na ca asau tad virahitaḥ punar āyāti lajjayā
iti amātyasya vacasā nṛpatiḥ yuktim āśritaḥ
prāptam kumāram anyedyus tat eva abhimukhaḥ vadat
kumāraḥ pi gṝham gatvā vivāha ucita maṅgalaiḥ
hauma dviradam āruhya sva janena sajāyayau
svarṇa vāraṇa saṃrūḍham tam āyāntam mahīpatiḥ
vilokya āścarya vibhavam mene puṇyavatām varam
kautukāt atha bhūpālaḥ tam gajam hema vigraham
āruroha mahā utsāhaḥ sumerum iva vajrabhṛt

original: ārūḍhe pṛthivīpāle na cacāla sa kuñjaraḥ /
analyzed: ārūḍhe pṛthivīpāle na cacāla sa kuñjaraḥ
prasarsarpa kumāreṇa punar ca alaṃkṛta āsanaḥ
tam jñātvā nṛpatiḥ devam tad prabhāveṇa vismitaḥ

original: dhanyo 'smīti vadan kanyāṃ dadau tasmai smaraśriyam // KAvk_48.72 //
analyzed: dhanyaḥ smi iti vadan kanyām dadau tasmai smara śriyam
abhyarcya kanyā ratnena nṛpatiḥ puruṣottamam
harṣa utsava samuddhūtaḥ sudhā sindhuḥ iva ābabhau
tatas kumāre dayitām ādāya sva gṛham gate
saphalaḥ bhūt anaṅgasya kārmuka ākarṣaṇa śramaḥ
nave vayasi bhoga arhe nava kāntā samāgame
tasya abhūt vibhava udāraḥ sadā nava nava utsavaḥ
tatas kadācid bhūpālaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ prasenajit
puṇya prabhāvam jāmātuḥ kalayan samacintayat
aho divyaḥ prabhāvaḥ sau kumārasya pradṛśyate

original: na hi sāmānyapuṇyānāṃ pāko bhavati tadvidhaḥ // KAvk_48.77 //
analyzed: na hi sāmānya puṇyānām pākaḥ bhavati tadvidhaḥ
kulam lakṣmī harmyam hṛta śaśi madā rūpa laharī
vayaḥ saṃbhoga arham guṇa paricayaḥ bhūṣaṇa cayaḥ
yaśaḥ puṇya udyāna prasṛta kusuma ullāsa ruciram

original: na vidmaḥ kasyāyaṃ kuśalapariṇāmasya vibhavaḥ // KAvk_48.78 //
analyzed: na vidmaḥ kasya ayam kuśala pariṇāmasya vibhavaḥ
iti saṃcintya su ciram sa saṃjāta kutūhalaḥ
sarvajña darśana avaddham āruroha manoratham

original: sa jātātaramāhūya sutāṃ ca sacivaiḥ saha /
analyzed: sa jāta ātaram āhūya sutām ca sacivaiḥ saha

original: bhagavantaṃ yayau draṣṭuṃ manasā prathamaṃ gataḥ // KAvk_48.80 //
analyzed: bhagavantam yayau draṣṭum manasā prathamam gataḥ
yāte dṛṣṭi patham jetavane saṃtyajya vāhanam

original: upasṛtyaḥ nṛpaḥ padbhyāṃ bhagavantaṃ vyalokayat // KAvk_48.81 //
analyzed: upasṛtyaḥ nṛpaḥ padbhyām bhagavantam vyalokayat
sa tam praṇamya tad pāda padma bhūti śikhāmaṇiḥ

original: sutāṃ jāmātaraṃ cāsmai namro nāmnā nyavedayat // KAvk_48.82 //
analyzed: sutām jāmātaram ca asmai namraḥ nāmnā nyavedayat
upaviṣṭeṣu sarveṣu praṇāma ānata mauliṣu

original: papraccha rājā sarvajñaṃ bhagavantaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // KAvk_48.83 //
analyzed: papraccha rājā sarvajñam bhagavantam kṛtāñjaliḥ
ayam kumāraḥ śrīmatām varaḥ

original: haimeva dantināyāto bhagavan kena karmaṇā // KAvk_48.84 //
analyzed: haima iva dantinā āyātaḥ bhagavan kena karmaṇā

original: iyaṃ cīvarakanyā ca matsutāsya navā vadhūḥ /
analyzed: iyam cīvara kanyā ca mad sutā asya navā vadhūḥ
kena puṇya prabhāveṇa jīvitāt adhivallabhā
iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitīśena sarva vid bhagavān jinaḥ

original: tamūce bhūpate puṃsāṃ puṇyodbhūtā vibhūtayaḥ // KAvk_48.86 //
analyzed: tam ūce bhūpate puṃsām puṇya udbhūtāḥ vibhūtayaḥ
yat udāraḥ yat ucitaḥ yat bhrājiṃṣṇu yat adbhutam
spṛhaṇīyam ca yat loke tat tat puṇya samudbahvam

original: vipaśvī bhagavān pūrvaṃ sugataḥ saha bhikṣubhiḥ /
analyzed: vipaśvī bhagavān pūrvam sugataḥ saha bhikṣubhiḥ

original: cacāra lokakṛpayā rājño bandhumataḥ pure // KAvk_48.88 //
analyzed: cacāra loka kṛpayā rājñaḥ bandhumataḥ pure
tasmin avasare tatra kumāryā saha dārakaḥ

original: vikrīḍāvartmani puraḥ kṛtvā dārumayaṃ gajam // KAvk_48.89 //
analyzed: vikrīḍā vartmani puras kṛtvā dāru mayam gajam
tau vilokya samāyāntam dhmāta jambūnada dyutim
phulla padma dala ākāra karuṇā snigdha locanam
bhagavantam samudbhūta tad bhakti sarasa unmukhau

original: krīḍāgajaṃ nivedyāsmai praṇatau tasthatuḥ puraḥ // KAvk_48.91 //
analyzed: krīḍā gajam nivedya asmai praṇatau tasthatuḥ puras
bhagavān api sarvajñaḥ tayoḥ jñātvā manoratham
dayayā caraṇa sparśam vidadhe dāru dantinaḥ
samyak citta prasādena dṛṣṭau bhagavatā atha tau
praṇīdhānam vivāhāya cakratuḥ dārakau mithas
kula prabhāva vibhavaiḥ bhūyāt janma mama ucitam
vāhanam hema dantī ca kumārasya iti abhūt matiḥ
dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ kanyā saṃsaktre cāru cīvare
janma cīvara yuktām syām aham
saḥ eṣa praṇidhānena jātaḥ tena iha hastakaḥ
iyam cīvarakanyā ca tanu cīvara lakṣaṇa
iti kṣrutvā kṣitipatiḥ tat vṛttam sugataḥ ditam
mukuṭa spṛṣṭa tad pāda padmaḥ sva bhavanam yayau

original: yāte savismayaṃ rājñi kumāraḥ saha jāyayā /
analyzed: yāte sa vismayam rājñi kumāraḥ saha jāyayā

original: kathyamānaṃ bhagavatā dharmaṃ śuśrāva śuddhadhīḥ // KAvk_48.98 //
analyzed: kathyamānam bhagavatā dharmam śuśrāva śuddha dhīḥ
tatas tau jāta vairāgyau kṣīṇa saṃsāra vāsanau
pravrajyayā jita kleśau śuddhām bodhim avāpatuḥ
vitata sukṛta puṇya abhyāsa yogena puṃsām bhavati kuśala bhājām dharma kāma artha saṃpad

original: abhimatamatha bhuktvā tatphalaṃ sadārāste vighanagaganakāntiṃ śāntimante bhajante // KAvk_48.100 //
analyzed: abhimatam atha bhuktvā tat phalam sa dārāḥ te vighana gagana kāntim śāntimante bhajante
